### cleanup() {#a3419f1e4b5a20b3ec28ae5f1f3c6f32b}

  prototype={<>static void cleanup (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Clear all memory not needed downstream.

Releases all memory not used downstream. In particular, saves Freqs.

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Dithering mass distributer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class splits up a single mass into portions by weight, dithering to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// spread out error.  No mass is lost.  The dithering precision depends on the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// precision of the product of \\a BlockMass and \\a BranchProbability.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The distribution algorithm follows.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///  1 Initialize by saving the sum of the weights in \\a RemWeight and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">///     mass to distribute in \\a RemMass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2 For each portion:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">///      1 Construct a branch probability, P, as the portion&#39;s weight divided</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">///         by the current value of \\a RemWeight.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">///      2 Calculate the portion&#39;s mass as \\a RemMass times P.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">///      3 Update \\a RemWeight and \\a RemMass at each portion by subtracting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">///         the current portion&#39;s weight and mass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72">DitheringDistributer</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#ae6c0133daebcc1cc43d268690dd76ebd"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#ae6c0133daebcc1cc43d268690dd76ebd">RemWeight</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a515a4de69fa4a07d16c0692e3cef1207"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a515a4de69fa4a07d16c0692e3cef1207">RemMass</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72">DitheringDistributer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a03c5183992b1c37a3db46deb244a3b72">Distribution</a> &amp;Dist, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> &amp;Mass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#abf138cba5a790381de6f4356e4f4386e">takeMass</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &gt;&gt; Shift) + (UINT64&#95;C(1) &amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &gt;&gt; (Shift - 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ac24f62f9ac4bff8273ed15798ea650e8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ac24f62f9ac4bff8273ed15798ea650e8">Distribution::normalize</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early exit for termination nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only bother if there are multiple successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.size() &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="#a6750f9ed35f65ba11b4c3c00d9d4fb4d">combineWeights</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early exit when combined into a single successor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.size() == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.front().Amount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine how much to shift right so that the total fits into 32-bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we shift at all, shift by 1 extra.  Otherwise, the lower limit of 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for each weight can cause a 32-bit overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shift = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ad9359948311bce04a3628b0db4376b77">DidOverflow</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    Shift = 33;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    Shift = 33 - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early exit if nothing needs to be scaled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Shift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we didn&#39;t overflow then combineWeights() shouldn&#39;t have changed the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sum of the weights, but let&#39;s double-check.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> == std::accumulate(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.end(), UINT64&#95;C(0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    &#91;&#93;(uint64&#95;t Sum, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight">Weight</a> &amp;W) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sum + W.Amount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &#125;) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected total to be correct&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recompute the total through accumulation (rather than shifting it) so that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it&#39;s accurate after shifting and any changes combineWeights() made above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sum the weights to each node and shift right if necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight">Weight</a> &amp;W : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale down below UINT32&#95;MAX.  Since Shift is larger than necessary, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can round here without concern about overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(W.TargetNode.isValid());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">    W.Amount = std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="#af7b0ebc6a85830e67121d86801e54d8f">shiftRightAndRound</a>(W.Amount, Shift));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(W.Amount &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> += W.Amount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute the loop scale for a loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6aca67ed248d1eb55621f38869372c65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6aca67ed248d1eb55621f38869372c65">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase::computeLoopScale</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/loopdata">LoopData</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute loop scale.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;compute-loop-scale: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a58791fa7d9b74c05628abed162ce2725">getLoopName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Infinite loops need special handling. If we give the back edge an infinite</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mass, they may saturate all the other scales in the function down to 1,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// making all the other region temperatures look exactly the same. Choose an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arbitrary scale to avoid these issues.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: An alternate way would be to select a symbolic scale which is later</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// replaced to be the maximum of all computed scales plus 1 This would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// appropriately describe the loop as having a large scale, without skewing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the final frequency computation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a5514a17c0ec3ccae841930a4f8f74f99">Scaled64</a> InfiniteLoopScale(1, 12);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LoopScale == 1 / ExitMass</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ExitMass == HeadMass - BackedgeMass</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6e6da6d64b5e1623157336544dd0e7a2">BlockMass</a> TotalBackedgeMass;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Mass : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.BackedgeMass)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalBackedgeMass += Mass;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6e6da6d64b5e1623157336544dd0e7a2">BlockMass</a> ExitMass = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#ac0e3f20571279f8b3896a687101d7151">BlockMass::getFull</a>() - TotalBackedgeMass;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Block scale stores the inverse of the scale. If this is an infinite loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its exit mass will be zero. In this case, use an arbitrary scale for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop scale.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExitMass.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#a3874be041c63e0b867d82331409a0de2">isEmpty</a>() ? InfiniteLoopScale : ExitMass.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#af48ed4af672b3ec628c6c79ac0746312">toScaled</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a49501fa3f3636bfe66d89739e5f43685">inverse</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; - exit-mass = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; ExitMass &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; (&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#ac0e3f20571279f8b3896a687101d7151">BlockMass::getFull</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; - &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; TotalBackedgeMass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;)\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; - scale = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482" lineLink="#ac95b88432687074901d5cc201b62be76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ac95b88432687074901d5cc201b62be76">convertFloatingToInteger</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp;BFI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Scaled64 &amp;Min, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Scaled64 &amp;Max) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale the Factor to a size that creates integers.  If possible scale</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// integers so that Max == UINT64&#95;MAX so that they can be best differentiated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Is is possible that the range between min and max cannot be accurately</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// represented in a 64bit integer without either loosing precision for small</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// values (so small unequal numbers all map to 1) or saturaturing big numbers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loosing precision for big numbers (so unequal big numbers may map to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// UINT64&#95;MAX). We choose to loose precision for small numbers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxBits = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Scaled64::DigitsType) &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Users often add up multiple BlockFrequency values or multiply them with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// things like instruction costs. Leave some room to avoid saturating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations reaching UIN64&#95;MAX too early.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Slack = 10;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  Scaled64 ScalingFactor = Scaled64(1, MaxBits - Slack) / Max;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Translate the floats to integers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;float-to-int: min = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Min &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, max = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; Max</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, factor = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; ScalingFactor &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">  (void)Min;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0; Index &lt; BFI.Freqs.size(); ++Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    Scaled64 <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> = BFI.Freqs&#91;Index&#93;.Scaled &#42; ScalingFactor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    BFI.Freqs&#91;Index&#93;.Integer = std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a>.toInt&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; - &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; BFI.getBlockName(Index) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;: float = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Unwrap a loop package.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515" lineLink="#a4a494d2e2688c4f4ec901183685c215b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a4a494d2e2688c4f4ec901183685c215b">unwrapLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp;BFI, LoopData &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;unwrap-loop-package: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; BFI.getLoopName(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Mass.toScaled();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.IsPackaged = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;  =&gt; combined-scale = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Propagate the head scale through the loop.  Since members are visited in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// RPO, the head scale will be updated by the loop scale first, and then the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// final head scale will be used for updated the rest of the members.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockNode &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Working = BFI.Working&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.Index&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">    Scaled64 &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = Working.isAPackage() ? Working.getPackagedLoop()-&gt;Scale</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since the loop has more than one header block, the mass flowing back into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// each header will be different. Adjust the mass in each header loop to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reflect the masses flowing through back edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To do this, we distribute the initial mass using the backedge masses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as weights for the distribution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
